trans-unit.source: The region or country where the regulation applies.
Tags that describe or classify that regulation (semicolon-separated enumeration). Used for matching.
URL of an image or logo for that regulation.
URL of an offical document for that regulation
Defines the exact values for the facet 'cert_true' which correspond to this regulation.
Defines which entries in the material property 'cert_name' are considered to refer to this regulation (string and regular expressions allowed).
